flavorText: The drumbeats of the horde echo in every heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Trommelschläge der Horde hallen in jedem Herzen wider.
foreignData.name: Rasender Sattelrohling
foreignData.text:
Eile
Kreaturen können deine Gegner und Planeswalker, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, angreifen, als ob sie Eile hätten.

foreignData.flavorText: Los tambores de la horda resuenan en todos los corazones.
foreignData.name: Jinete brutal enloquecido
foreignData.text:
Prisa.
Todas las criaturas pueden atacar a tus oponentes y a los planeswalkers que tus oponentes controlan como si esas criaturas tuvieran la habilidad de prisa.

foreignData.flavorText: Les tambours de la horde résonnent dans chaque cœur.
foreignData.name: Brute hussarde hystérique
foreignData.text:
Célérité
Toutes les créatures peuvent attaquer vos adversaires et les planeswalkers que vos adversaires contrôlent comme si ces créatures avaient la célérité.

foreignData.flavorText: I rulli di tamburi dell'orda riecheggiano in tutti i cuori.
foreignData.name: Cavaliere Bestiale Frenetico
foreignData.text:
Rapidità
Tutte le creature possono attaccare i tuoi avversari e i planeswalker controllati dai tuoi avversari come se quelle creature avessero rapidità.

foreignData.flavorText: 軍団の太鼓の音が全員の心に響く。
foreignData.name: 激情の鞍暴れ
foreignData.text:
速攻
クリーチャーはすべて、あなたの対戦相手や、あなたの対戦相手がコントロールしているプレインズウォーカーを、それらのクリーチャーが速攻を持っているかのように攻撃できる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — オーク・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: Os tambores da horda ecoam em todos os corações.
foreignData.name: Ginete Bronco Exaltado
foreignData.text:
Ímpeto
Todas as criaturas podem atacar seus oponentes e os planeswalkers que eles controlam como se tivessem ímpeto.

foreignData.flavorText: 部落的鼓声回荡在每寸赤心中。
foreignData.name: 狂热巨兽骑士
foreignData.text:
敏捷
所有生物都能视同具有敏捷异能地攻击你的对手和由你的对手操控之鹏洛客。

foreignData.flavorText: 部落的鼓聲迴盪在每寸赤心中。
foreignData.name: 狂熱巨獸騎士
foreignData.text:
敏捷
所有生物都能視同具有敏捷異能地攻擊你的對手和由你的對手操控之鵬洛客。

name: Frenzied Saddlebrute
originalText:
Haste
All creatures can attack your opponents and planeswalkers your opponents control as though those creatures had haste.

rulings.text: Frenzied Saddlebrute doesn’t cause any creatures to gain haste. It just allows all creatures (including those you don’t control) to attack as though they had haste if they’re attacking your opponents or their planeswalkers.

text:
Haste
All creatures can attack your opponents and planeswalkers your opponents control as though those creatures had haste.
